meanings.definition: An expression of dissatisfaction or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: She had many complaints about the food at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The customer's complaints were taken seriously by the manager.
meanings.sent3: His complaints about the noisy neighbors were heard by everyone in the building.
meanings.sent4: The flood of complaints overwhelmed the customer service team.
meanings.sent5: The child's loud complaints echoed through the house.

meanings.definition: A reason for dissatisfaction or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: The lack of parking spaces was a major source of complaints for the residents.
meanings.sent2: One of the main complaints from the employees was the outdated computer system.
meanings.sent3: The cat's constant complaints about the empty food bowl were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The mountain of complaints seemed insurmountable to the overwhelmed manager.
meanings.sent5: The never-ending complaints about the weather became tiresome to listen to.
